name: Can Figure Game?
description:
Explore a strange "game menu" that doesn't take itself too seriously.

CONTROLS: Navigate the menu with the "WASD" keys. The mouse is also useful sometimes.

Credits/Resources used:

      • Sounds
        • "Farm Animals" by Secretlondon licensed CC-BYSA 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/farm-animals
        • "Voiceover Pack (40+ Lines)" by Kenney (www.kenney.nl) licensed CCO: https://opengameart.org/content/voiceover-pack-40-lines
        • "UI sound effects library" by Little Robot Sound Factory (www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com) licensed CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/ui-sound-effects-library
        • "UI sound effects pack" by ViRiX (Some of the sounds in this project were created by David McKee (ViRiX) soundcloud.com/virix) licensed CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/ui-sound-effects-pack
        • "15 vocal male strain/hurt/pain/jump sounds" by Iwan Gabovitch licensed CC-BY-SA 3.0, GPL 3.0, GPL 2.0: https://opengameart.org/content/15-vocal-male-strainhurtpainjump-sounds
        • "GUI Sound Effects" by Lokif licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/gui-sound-effects
      • Graphics
        • "UI Pack" by Kenney (www.kenney.nl) licenced CCO: https://opengameart.org/content/ui-pack
        • "Platformer Art Complete Pack (often updated)" by Kenney (www.kenney.nl) licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-art-complete-pack-often-updated
